subject: Re: [junit] JUnit and Ant
msgSnippet: ... look at the  tag in Ant (it s listed right below the  tag in the documentation I believe). -- Jason Rogers I am crucified with Christ:
messageBody:
On Tuesday 12 October 2004 13:45, ragandw wrote:
> I'm new to the group, so forgive me if this has been posted.
>
> I'm running JUnit when I do an Ant build. Works geat... creates XML
> files whenever it gets a failure. I can go into the files and check
> out the errors, not problem... but is anyone aware of a parser that
> will take all the files and put them in one report that is a little
> more friedly to view?

look at the <junitreport> tag in Ant (it's listed right below the <junit> tag
in the documentation I believe).

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
